name: Easy What Am I? Trivia Quiz | Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: When you sit down to write a letter to your Grandma you use me.  I write and if you make a mistake you can wipe me away with my tip.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
pencil.

	Although some ball-point pens can erase, I hope that you understood that I am a pencil.

questions.text: I have four legs and when you get home from school I come and greet you at the door wagging my tail.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
dog.

	I hope that you do not have a pig that does this same thing.

questions.text: I come in a can or a bottle and when you open me up I will hiss and fizz at you.  Don't shake me up though or you might have a huge mess to clean up.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
pop.

	If your milk does this, then throw it out because it has to be bad.

questions.text: I have either two doors or four doors.  I can go really fast.  When you are in me you have to wear a belt.  I can be any color of the rainbow.  However (in the USA, at least) you can't drive me until you are sixteen.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
car.

	At least you had better not use me until you are about sixteen or you will be in big trouble!

questions.text: I am usually black or white.  Sometimes I can come in other colors, but not usually.  Whenever you want to get rid of something you give it to me.  Then when you are done with me you kick me to the curb.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
trash bag.

	I hope that none of you picked your sister or brother.

questions.text: I am very hot when I am being used.  Sometimes fire shoots out of me.  You can cook on me outside.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
grill.

	I have heard that if it gets really hot you can fry an egg on the roof of your car, but don't try it!

questions.text: You climb up me and then back down.  I am in the house.  There are usually a lot of me all in a row.  Unless you have an elevator you have to use me. I am usually the last thing you climb before you go to bed. What am I?
questions.explanation:
stairs.

	I hope that the last thing you climb is not the walls.

questions.text: I am flat and round.  I have a silver back.  If you put me in a machine I will play music for you.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
cd.

	I hope that you did not choose record.  You would be showing your age if  you did.

questions.text: With a remote you can turn me on and off.  You can also change my shows this way.  On me you can see "CatDog", three little girls who save the world, and mom and dad may want to watch the news.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
television.

	You can watch these things on your computer, too these days!

questions.text: I have a keyboard and you might be playing on me right now.  What am I?
questions.explanation:
computer.

	This should have been an easy one.
